summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Tenth Avenue West from Lu Street to Howe Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading, under Ordinance No. 13191, creating Local Improvement District No. 1199 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
